title: What are some labor intensive software development tasks that will be automated by AI? - Quora

response.answer_text: Any large network with millions of connection points and billions of messages requires careful monitoring and control. AI will be useful for automating control and monitoring, and then presenting the state of affairs in some human-understandable ways while essentially regulating itself. There are many examples of this in human society, so AI will be widely applied.

It’s not AI but the more modern IDEs have some nice features such as automatic recognition of duplicated code across modules. I think it wouldn’t be too much harder for it to offer to hoist out duplicated code into a common function that can be used in multiple places. There are a lot refactoring chores that could be improved on.
